response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to substantial growth. Given its immense value to you, we are offering it at an exclusive price of $900,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a premium yet competitive rate. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of partnering with you.", "product_price": 900000}
